text: In Paris, early in the morning, when the bakers pass with their bread baskets to their heads, a strange baker crosses between them, whose basket also humidates and smells of fresh life and has the type of recent and early bread baskets. But do you know what basket that young-aged baker carries in his head? For the guillotine basket, with which they've just been beheaded and will be buried in the graveyard of the spurious. FIN
title: El extraño panadero
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
